授業目的: This course introduces students to the complex and dynamic relations between Japan and China in modern times. It will examine major areas of interaction between the two countries from politics to defense and from economics to culture.
到達目標: By taking this course, students will gain a general understanding of the key issues of Japan-China relations in the global context and the main scholarly debates on relevant issues. They will also improve on their writing and analytical skills.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
